title: NBA-balldontlie-moneyline
text: Welcome to the website of the nba-balldontlie-moneyline project! The goal of this project is to explore the balldontlie API data and its usefulness in predicting the outright winners of NBA games (i.e. the moneyline in betting terms).

title: data
text: We obtained the data for \(2021\), \(2022\) and \(2023\) seasons using the API. We will explore \(5\) separate datasets: 1. players’ data 2. teams’ data 3. games’ data 4. players’ stats (basic) per games 5. players’ stats (advanced) per games
